genInfo: December 14, 2020 Advanced In Person (Early) Voting begins for the General Election Runoff for Federal Offices
absenteeInfo: November 18, 2020 Earliest day for a registrar to mail an absentee ballot for the General Election Runoff for Federal Offices

Mail your completed ballot. For voters within the country, all absentee ballots must arrive at your county election office by Election Day. You can also drop your absentee ballot off at a drop-off location in your county
